Pentaho Platform JavaScript APIs

View on GitHub

Lore…

  • Pentaho Visualization API ⭐ 3.0 beta
    The Pentaho Visualisation API provides a unified way to visualize data across the Pentaho suite (Analyzer, PDI, CDF). The stock CCC charts provide a set of ready-to-use chart types, customisable and extendable.
  • Pentaho Data API
    Classes and interfaces used for data representation by the Visualization API.
    • Data Access API
      sad sadas dasdsa dsad sa dsad sadsadas.
  • Pentaho Type API
    Pentaho Client Metadata Model.
  • Pentaho Core API
    Pentaho Web Platform's base functionality.
    • Environment
      The Pentaho Web Client Platform's contextual information.
    • Services
      AMD plugin which maintains a collection of logical modules and their dependencies.
    • Configuration System
      Classes and interfaces related to the configuration of value types.
    • pentaho/lang
      Classes and interfaces used as type system building blocks to form other classes and interfaces of the Pentaho Web Platform.
  • Pentaho Web Client Package
    How to package and deploy web client resources into the Pentaho platform.
